messages.content: You are a star, Amanda! You are a very hard working woman and you always support all the community.

issues.brexitEurope: We believe that only Theresa May, Amanda Solloway and the Conservative Party can provide the stability we need to make Brexit successful.

endorsements.endorsement: You are a star, Amanda! You are a very hard working woman and you always support all the community.

Volunteering in A&E, I see the love and dedication of the staff at the Derby Royal Hospital. I know that Amanda has been a strong advocate for our local health services and will have the influence within the government to get the best deal for us locally.

We are both ex UKIP voters. We believe that only Theresa May, Amanda Solloway and the Conservative Party can provide the stability we need to make Brexit successful and that's why we're backing Amanda Solloway in Derby North.

Amanda has helped me tremendously. She shared her business knowledge to set up a personal training studio in Darley Abbey. The studio has gone from strength to strength and Amanda has always been on hand to provide advice along the way.

examples: Volunteering in A&E, I see the love and dedication of the staff at the Derby Royal Hospital.
We believe that only Theresa May, Amanda Solloway and the Conservative Party can provide the stability we need to make Brexit successful.
